00029 -(IBAction)doConvert:(id)sender{
00030         
00031         // 更新输出
00032         float rate = [[rateField text] floatValue];
00033         float amount = [[amountField text] floatValue];
00034         NSString *output = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%0.3f", [ConverterModel convertCurrency:amount withRate:rate]];
00035         // setFloatValue:方法在iPhone中不适用
00036         [outputField setText:output];
00037         
00038         // 为了在按下按钮以后，软键盘会自动消失，这里需要解除文本框的第一响应者的身份
00039         [rateField resignFirstResponder];
00040         [amountField resignFirstResponder];
00041         [outputField resignFirstResponder];
00042 }
00043 
00044 @end
